strapiPost.title: Get Your Putt-Putt On
strapiPost.content:
Golftoberfest is a Northwest Arkansas original mini-golf tournament, and it begins this Saturday (Oct. 16). 

  • Gather your players: The tournament will be held at two different locations over the span of 2 weeks. Teams of four can play at Gator Golf in Fayetteville or Golf Mountain in Lowell for an 18 hole competition. 
  • For more than just fun: Registration is $20 a person, and each participant will receive a t-shirt, cap, and a chance to win a prize. Proceeds from the event will go toward the Single Parent Scholarship Fund of Northwest Arkansas.

For more information, click HERE.
